titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to permit Members to characterize action in the Senate in the same manner that they may characterize action in the House.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 9/17/2002--Introduced. Amends rule XVII (Decorum and Debate) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require remarks in debate, including references to the Senate or its Members, to be confined to the question under debate, avoiding personality.
